    • Constructor Detail

      • TwitchChatBot

        public TwitchChatBot(java.lang.String nickIn,
                     java.lang.String pwIn,
                     boolean pingBackIn,
                     int clientIn)
        Primary constructor
        Parameters:
        nickIn - the Twitch.tv username of the bot
        pwIn - The oauth key (not including "oauth:")
        pingBackIn - Option to have the bot automatically respond to pings.
        clientIn - Integer between 1 and 3, corresponding to the Twitch chat client you wish to use.

      • TwitchChatBot

        public TwitchChatBot(java.lang.String nickIn,
                     java.lang.String pwIn)
        Overloaded constructor automatically sets autoPingBack to true
        Parameters:
        nickIn - the Twitch.tv username of the bot
        pwIn - The oauth key (not including "oauth:")
